headline: Greta: Good deal or bad deal with Iran? It's impossible to know right now
subHeadline: Greta's 'Off the Record' commentary, 4/2/15: We've heard lots of opinions about the US framework for an agreement on Iran's nuclear program, but we don't have specific details. One thing is certain: No one wants Iran to have a nuclear weapon

utterances.speaker: RONALD REAGAN, FORMER PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: You repeat that at every meeting.   And that's my "Off the Record" comment tonight.

utterances.speaker: But one thing is certain
utterances.utterance: No one in his right mind wants Iran to have a nuclear weapon. That would change the world forever -- and in the worst possible way.

utterances.speaker: So, while there are many skeptics to this framework -- and I understand why -- we don't have the all-important details. Let's not forget the words of a former US president at another very important time in history
RONALD REAGAN, FORMER PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.utterance: You repeat that at every meeting. And that's my "Off the Record" comment tonight.
